All the bugs have now been fixed that were caused by the update and a new map has replaced the run for fruits map that was broken. The Map now also has lighting and new music.
STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* @ 72.26.196.164:27015
About The Map - Map consists of 14 oldish minigame maps that are too short to add to a server rotation (IMO). But they are that great that they deserve to be on there. - I DID NOT MAKE THESE MAPS! I simply added them all together and tweaked it so that the map ran smoothly. Check the credits list! Awsome mappers in there.
Map Info - Fourteen Maps to Choose from. - 50 Player spawn points.
Map's
Spawn <3
 Spawn By: Sm0oth123 A fantastic spawn layout made by Sm0oth123. This is better known from surf_XIV. One person will make it to the middle and choose the map for the rest of the players. If that player takes too long then it will auto-choose a map.
Tv Towers Remix
 Map By: HappyVanMan In this map the T's spawn on top of one TV tower, whilst the CT's spawn at the bottom of the opposite tower. Buy your guns, use the elevators and kill each other! Note: The bridge on the top will take 2000 damage before it collapses.
Break Containers
 Map By: ??? Unknown (user was removed from FPSB) In this map you are equipped with M3's and Knifes. You can shoot down the support legs on the contained which will topple over and crush players. Use the boost ramps to get on top of the map and also there is an AWP and buyzone in the middle!
Race
 Map by: Nemesis234 Race the opposing team to the end of the map to get your AWPs. Note: you can throw grenades and knife other players through the glass if they get too close.
Jump Slider
 Map By: [SG] Paul As seen in mg_pauls_multigames but bigger. Note: There is a secret on this level that only I can activate =] (unless an admin does a certain something) ;)
Knife Ring
 Map By: Shluk Knife it out in the ring. The map was set up for 1 v 1 fights, but unfortunatly noblock wins this one. Map is fun, make sure to get all your team pushing on the wall at the same time to counter balance the group inside the ring =]
Volleyball
 Map By: lolobubu In this map you must shoot the ball with your glocks onto the other teams side. The ball will cause -2hp/s to the teams, depending which side the ball is on.
Ice Skate
 Map By: SV | RaZer Ice skate? Not much really to say. A nice little map made by Razer, which I had to edit a tiny bit. Ice skate around the map by strafing on the ice, the glass in the middle will break after 60 seconds, you will find an M3 inside.
Slide Race
 Map By: SV | RaZer This is a pretty simple slide race map, that is not too hard to beat, but it gives noobier players a chance to win. Get to the end of the map and get an M3, Deagle and Knife.
Rotating HE War
 Map By: Shougunner He Grenade war, however you only get one grenade so use if wisely. The rotating blade spins around so try to dodge it by hugging the walls and timing your runs perfectly.
Scoutsknives
 Map By: Sm0oth123 A nice scoutsknives map that has a teleporter at the bottom to take you back onto the boost at the top of the map.
Jump Rope
 Map By: Pho3nix Jump around the jumprope? The 'rope' speeds up over time, if its wireframe then im not too sure why it is like that.
Windtunnel
 Map By: Corn Ibulus Use your M3's and Knifes to kill the opposing team. Kind of fail as a few people die instantly from when they meet in the middle =/ but hey.
Balance Four Way
 Map By: Pho3nix & SolidSnake Try to hold your balance with your team on the four platforms. Try to be tactical and cause the opposing teams platform to collapse. Grenades spawn in the middle.
Musical Rooms <3
 Map By: UKCS-Alias An awsome map by Alias. Like musical chairs, but with rooms. Try and beat your fellow team mates and opposition by getting into the rooms before they do. 5 Stages, as the round progresses there becomes fewer doors to get into. Will you be the last one alive?
NOTE: PMs were sent to all active FPSB members with maps that are in this map, asking for permission to use them in here. All replys were positive from what I have recieved back.
Hey there this is my first map so therer could be bugs in if you find eny write to me email: sepe_petersen@hotmail.com
Thanks to Louie for the great map idea :)

**SERVER REQUERIMENTS**
-High Rate values (minimum should be 30000, to avoid lag or choke you should have 50000 at least).
-Recomended 33 or 66 tickrate, with 100 you will have more choke.

Current version: v2 (beta)

The objective of the map is to use chopters to kill enemies, or defend the beach against copters.
Wins the team who kills the enemy.

Attack/defence
The map chooses randomly one team to drive copters and the other to defence the beach with 50% of chance.

Copter Controls:
WASD to control copter.
Primary fire to fly up.
Secondary fire to shoot.

Cannon/Vulcan Controls:
WASD to move canon.
Primary fire to shoot.

Weapons:
Players can use weapons to destroy copters, weapons placed at the sapawnroom are:
6 M4A1
6 AK47
2 M249
1 AUG
1 SG552
Weapons cause less damage than canons, but allow players attack while moving, making them a harder target.

Copter features:
-Is very very strong: needs around 6 rocket or 100 bullets (m249) to be destroyed.
-Shots 2 rockets at the same time (works at 1 against other copters).
-Low damage.
-Small radius, must be a perfect impact to kill a player in one shot.
0% protection against explosions.
50% protection against the vulcan canon.
70% protection against weapons.

Canon features:
-Unbreakable, but the player who controls it can die easily.
-Shots 1 rocket faster and with bigger explosion radius than copter rockets.
-Cannot kill teammates.
-Explodes near copters, dont need to impact to explode.

Vulcan canon features:
-Low range.
-Medium damage against copters.
-Firing increases vulcan temperature.
-When overheat limit reached vulcan blocked during 6 seconds.

Score:
-When a player dies or when copter is destroyed players will get points:
Points to defensor:
-For each copter destroyed 3 points.
-For all enemies killed 8 points.
Points to attacker:
-For eache deensor killed 2 points.
-For all enemies killed 6 points.
Points are given to all players of the team, not only to the player that get the score.

Knockback:
-Copters can get pushed back when shooted (as in zombiemod) to increase or decrease knockback use this value:
phys_pushscale
-Recomended values from 1 to 3; negative vaules will atract copters (not recomended); value to 0 disables knockback
-----------------------------------------------------------
Changelog:

--v1--

First release.

--v2--

-Copters now get damage against weapons.
-Added weapons for defence.
-16 to 8 defensive canons (6 vulcan and 2 normal canons)
-Added crosshairs to canons and copters for easier aim.
-Decreased the chance of server and client crash (players can use only weapons to aviod the crash).
-Modifyed canon model.
-Added score for killing enemies.

--v2b--

-Fixed server and client crash after CS:S OrangeBox update.

Original map by FryzyeR
Ported by Ganter1234

ENGLISH

Hey guys!
---------

Welcome to my new vehicles map! 
Take care, it works only for 25 players, no spawns more because it can be unstable on some server.
DON'T WORRY, I GUARANTEE THIS MAP IS STABLE!
------------------------------------------------

What's new ?

- The possibility of flying in... CSS!

- Play in a nice map! Nice graphics and skybox :)

- Stable vehicles

- Boats, machine guns

- An FPS increased map

### This map is very playable, enjoyable, made for your server! 
**PLAY THE VIDEOS IN HD :)**

FRANCAIS
===============================================================================================

---------

Bienvenue dans ma nouvelle map véhicule :)
Cette map ne marche que pour 25 spawns, car sinon la map pourrait être légèrement instable et j'ai atteint le maximum des capacités du moteur Source selon Hammer Editor! 
NE VOUS INQUIETEZ PAS, CETTE MAP EST STABLE!
------------------------------------------------

Mais qu'est-ce qui change ?

- La possibilité de voler sur... CSS!

- Jouer sur une belle map! De beaux graphiques et une skybox à couper le souffle! :)

- Des véhicules stables

- Des bateaux, mini-guns

- Une map avec des performances augmentés (bon ratio fps/graphiques)

### La carte est très jouable, elle est faite pour votre serveur!

_aChangeLog.text: Auto-Select Bug - You were able to select a map after auto-select. That is fixed.
Bunny jumping out of the map fixed. (hopefully)
Auto-Select - If the person who goes upstairs doesn't select anything in 8 seconds, a level is automatically opened.
Fixed some people not having weapons.
Changed waiting time from 6 seconds to 3 seconds after a weapon is selected.
Hopefully, fixed 2 people going upstairs if they touch the toilet in 0.01s of each other. Not sure I fixed it though :))

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Fixed a few bugs and things I forgot.

_sText:
A multi aim map consisting of Knife, Desert Eagle, AK47-M4A1 and AWP arenas.

I suggest using it without deathmatch mode. Although I don't think there would be any problems with DM other then spawn killings.

The person who reaches the toilet first gets to choose which weapon level will be played. Without DM this will happen at every round start. With DM, level will be only chosen one time (unless everyone on a team dies at the same time.)

I tried to make them look as unique as possible.

Thanks for the awesome skybox [t.I.P.](http://gamebanana.com/members/966996 "t.I.P.") 

Hope you enjoy it,
Sinsic

P.S. I'll put the individual levels as maps, so people don't want to play other levels can just play that. I'll add links here.

UpdateLog

Beta3 - 13.05.2013

1. Auto-Select Bug - You were able to select a map after auto-select. That is fixed.
2. 
A few more fps optimization.
3. 
Bunny jumping out of the map fixed. (hopefully)


Beta2 - 09.04.2013

1. Auto-Select - If the person who goes upstairs doesn't select anything in 8 seconds, a level is automatically opened.
2. 
Fixed some people not having weapons.
3. 
Changed waiting time from 6 seconds to 3 seconds after a weapon is selected.
4. 
Hopefully, fixed 2 people going upstairs if they touch the toilet in 0.01s of each other. Not sure I fixed it though :))

Here's the new version of my mg aim map, since the last version i changed almost everything.

Every round teams spawn with a random weapon and are teleported to one of five aim maps. Every round there is possibility that gravity will change.

For now there are only 5 maps but expect more in future releases.

Please rate, comment and enjoy. Also leave feedback and tell me if the textures work correctly.

There are 18 CT and 18 T spawns on the map.

Every round you get a random weapon and you are teleported to one of 4 mini aim maps:
-little map with textured boxes and crates with low gravity
-a minecraft aim map
-labirynth with glass walls
-dark corridors

This is an alpa version of the map, so i will release updates in future.
Please say if textures work correctly and share your opininon.

This map has 20 t spawns and 20 ct spawns, it's under the minigames section because it's better used as a MG map not an aim map because of the trigger_Pushes on the ramps give you a boost to bunnyhop off, I use this map on my MG server and people seem to like it. So i decided to post it up here.

The map as two ramps that allow you to gain speeds so you can bunnyhop or if you are good get the awp at the top of the skybox.

There is an awp on the bottom of the pool and in the fire, but the fire does 100 damage so you have to be lucky to get that one ;)

Their is also a CT buyzone and a T buyzone.

Thats all their really is to the map it's a simple creation, but fun to play on.

_sText: My first map, at first wanted to make a aim map... ended up with a mix of Aim and mg because of the secret and the random guns at spawn. I hope you like it if there are any bugs just tell me

mg_ahuntepicminis_beta
Map created by Ahunt Maps. http://gamebanana.com/members/426718

Special thanks goes to Devieus from gamebanana for making the ball model used in foosball.
http://gamebanana.com/members/1088541


This map took me several weeks to complete to its beta phase, so I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I have enjoyed creating it. Please report any bugs to my gamebanana page, in the comments under this map. 
This map includes 6 mini games, not as mny as your average mini game map but its sure to be one of the
most fun maps, that I have created at least. Players must race through Frogger to get to the room 
where you can choose the mini game.

Mini games included in this map are...

Knife Fight

The setting is in a Mortal Kombat arena, with sounds and overlays that I have recreated, anyone
who has played Mortal Kombat on the NES will recognize these little features. If you are waiting to fight
and want to see the action just walk to the either side of the ring and you will get a ring side view of
what's going on inside the ring. just simply walk away to exit the ring side view.

Duck Hunt

EVERYONE should know what this is based off of, if not then your just too young. Players must shoot the
opposite teams ducks to win. Each duck you kill is one point, and hurts the other team for 10 HP. 
10 ducks for each team and the ducks speed up after each kill, but watch out because you don't want to
shoot your own ducks. CT must shoot the RED ducks, and T must shoot the BLUE ducks.
Each player is given a shotgun.

Juggernaut

In this mini game each player starts out with 200 HP and 2 x speed. There are 4 juggernaut packages available
that give you 750 HP and the m249 machine gun, but there are draw backs to being the juggernaut, your
speed will be decreased dramatically compared to the other players. Along with the juggernaut packages there
are 6 health kits through out the map, but are other wise useless if your HP isn't below 100 because they
will only regenerate your health up to 100 HP. Each player is given a deagle after spawn, in front of your spawn
I have placed 25 m4a1 rifles, if you want a different weapon you must find it within the map.

Foosball

Table soccer, table football, foosball, call it what you will but it is what it is. This map is limited up to 28 players,
14 players on each, so if your server is holding more than 28 players at that time its first come first serve.
Each player can move from left to right on the field and kick back and forth. Your team must score 3 points to win.
Each point scored will award your team one point. If the ball gets stuck somewhere just press the button with the white
podium and it will reset the ball. The ball drops into the middle and is kicked out in a random direction. Pick a player by pressing your
USE button on one of the player podiums, press Use or jump to exit your players UI.
I would like to thank Devieus from the GameBanana community for making foosball possible. without him we wouldn't have a ball to kick around.
FOOSBALL CONTROLS
W & S moves the player from left to right.
A & D kicks the ball back and forth. if your confused on which goal to aim for, just kick forward.
Left Mouse Button - Hold this to get a better view of your player, it will track your players movement.
Right Mouse Button - Hold this to get a better view of the field, it will track the ball. 

Stand Off

This is a 1 on 1 match using deagles. After entering the arena each player will be given a deagle at the same time.
After your opponent dies your weapon will be taken away to make it fair for the next player entering the arena.
Your health will be regenerated if your get hurt so the next player doesn't have an advantage.

Scoutknives

Last but not least, scoutknives. This shouldn't need any explaining.

Map features ===================== - Many different obstacles, teamwork required - Checkpoints - Drivable vehicles - NPCs - Bossfight - Custom particles, music, textures and models - 64 spawns, but playing with around 4-12 people is recommended for best experience Music used in the map ===================== [SDDx - Inspiration](http://youtu.be/k0xv2dHOiOI)
[Wobzor - Final Point](http://youtu.be/tR6DIWglZQc)
[Underwaterbeats - Lonely Soul](http://youtu.be/f3_JnfhxZJ0)
[Soulipsyz - Highland](http://youtu.be/q5agNCLu10g)
[MachinimaSound - Exigence](http://youtu.be/y4G67h9Q2mE)

Map inspired by the video game "Frogger". performed with the source graphics engine and a theme a little different.

====objective====
Try to reach the end of the 3 types of crossing streets, the difficulty will increase. The first road is easy, the second is medium, and the third is hard.

The end has to go by car to the end of the motorway, while you shoot the enemy team is on the other side. Try to shoot the car opposite and not yours, the car might explode.

There helicopters to which you can assemble and launch bombs to the opposing team. But to reach the helicopter could be difficult :).

====Secret weapons====
There are 2 kinds of secret weapons, one for CT's and one for T's. The CT's have minigun. While T's have a rocket launcher.
The secret weapons have a limited use, can be used only one time, but are extremely powerful. If you get one, do not waste it, use it for last.

There is another secret, which does not speak anything :).

Enjoy the map.
(Sorry for my bad english)
					FuChSS

MG_50ARENAS _V1

Brand New Map with 50 different arenaz

Finally finished this map with !50! different arenaz and insane randomness.there are so many arenas - some are small,some are big.Just fast n fun action.

Features [V1]:

  • There are total of 50 arenas and one main spawnzone [different textures,styles,sizes etc]
  • Randomness: [activates when somebody enters the center of spawnzone]
    • Random Arena [1x50 chance]
    • Random Weapons [all weapons except grenades...yeah,all ~25]
    • Random Health [50HP\100HP\150HP\200HP\1HP..really\100HP-HEADSHOTS(only with 100hp)]
    • Random Gravity [1-0.5 or 800-400 like 1\0.9\0.8\0.7\0.6\0.5 - double chance for normal gravity]
    • Random Music System ..yep [when one song ends another begins(always random+diff time)][edited cuts & fadein\out][anyway i think you'll die before the song ends]
    • Random EFFECT [1x3 chance for effects - and second 1x3(2x3 for only color effect) chance for unique graphic effect(a total of 49effects - 3maintypes\6subtypes with different styles and all colors +standart ,check it out)]
  • First player who enters the main spawnzone(center,ofcourse) will change skin color to black +alpha[little advantage in shadows or think whatever you want]
  • Custom Content
  • Music
  • No fall damage [dont try to jump into the sky]
  • 64 slots
  • NavFile


requires noblock plugin

CHANGELOG:

v1 - first public release

MG_50ARENAS_V1

Simple mini-game map based on a very old CS 1.6 map i used to play.

No real objectives, only to kill all the other team.

You are limited to the 2 spawns and the battle room.

rounds are very quick.

Notes:
Audio Credits -- Splinter Cell Conviction -- The Collateral

[Not entirely the full map in Splinter Cell since it would cause extremely low fps]
[First map by developer]

[Objectives] 
1. Eliminate the opposing force.
2. Escape the building and detonate.

Share and Have fun! >> Made by airborne

MAP NOW FIXED FOR LINUX SERVERS - SERVER OWNERS PLEASE JUST REPLACE THE FILE ON YOUR SERVER. CLIENTS DO NOT HAVE TO REDOWNLOAD THE MAP.
About The Map - Dodge and avoid the flying blocks by running around onto different platforms. - Survive for 90 seconds. - To access and drive the chopper then get a lucky physics boost or bhop into the middle of the hole. - Finish of the opposing team in one of four random endings.
Map Info - One driveable helictoper that can drop blocks. (Right click to drop, 8 second respawn time) - Four random map endings. - One easter egg (not including the choppa). - 40 Player spawn points. - Custom Textures. - Custom Sound.
Map Endings
Ice Skate
 In the iceskating ending everyone must grab a knife and meet in the middle. They must iceskate (strafing like you would do with surfin). Note: Smash blocks are still flying out of the hole so dont get crushed by one!
Climb
 Pretty simple ending if you are a half decent climber. Race the opposing team to the awp's, but be aware of falling objects and the smash blocks.
Knife Fight
 Knife fight the opposing team around the centre of the map (smash blocks) on platforms that go up and down on touch. Dont get hit by the blocks!
Low Gravity Scoutsknives
 Grab a scout and a knife. Duke it out on the floating platforms!

Objective:

Both teams spawn in a buyzone and then drop down into the maze, they have to try and find + kill the enemy team which can be hard because its hard to find them, its almost imposable to camp because all routes eventually link up and you never know when someone is behind you. there is alot of climbing and falling in this map so be careful you dont fall xD.

Both spawn have trigger_push's to push afk people out of spawn and all textures that are used are custom.

It has 32 T spawns are 32 Ct spawns

Thanks, Duffy :D

Please rate and comment but only comment if your going to be creative.

Medium big map with snow.
put in maps folder

It too me like week to make so hope you enjoy
Also! Don't forget to buy weapons every round!

This is pretty much multi-games like map.
You get to chose what battle you will play after you get
as the first one into the choosing room.
Then you play a battle map with some annoying music, enjoy.

Here are the battle maps inside the map:

- Stairs (Long staircase with an elevator)
- Pool (Pool with 2 starting rooms and few boxes)
- Maze (Maze that disables itself after few minutes of playing)
- Highway (Two roads between two tunnels, with some cranes used as cover)
- Sewers (Sewers with room for each team to spawn in)
- Dev (Very small map including 4 small houses and some crates)
- Nether (Two floating islands above lava)
- Submarine (Two floor submarine that is being filled with water)
- Speed circle (It's a speed circle, nothing to say)
- Fortress (T spawns inside the house, CT outside, T must defend the house)
- Sparta (Map based on this is sparta scene, includes few crates and a pit)
- Glass (Very very small map with breakable glass floor and two walls)
- Eye rape (Very bright pink map including wall and two windows)
- Rooftop (Rooftop based map, but with sea skybox :/ )
- Breach (Red lightened map with few crates and walls)
- Hill (T spawns at the top, CT at the bottom)
- Cemetery (Cemetery with few cover bushes and two walls for spawning)
- Freezer (Six rooms connected to each other, you walk super slow in here)

MG_100TRAPS_V3


New Huge Nonkilling Challenge with !100! different traproomz. Some levels are easy (first traps), some harder.

Features [V3]:
- Nice looking custom\devstyle textures (with light)
- Many different traps
- Nodamage\Hpregen in water
- Teleports on each traproom (nokill)
- 64 slots
- Abstract partyhall , little soccer place at the end
- 4 bonus traps at the end (1trap - 50points and 3traps - 75points\score each time)
- Leveling system (+1 point on each trap and reset at start) (+100 at the end so finally it must be 200) - NavFile
- Relaxin music at all traps (long mix +3songs at the end. At the end you can change back to mix or to bonus songs)
- HelpButton at the end (you can help your teammates to finish that map. It will disable all teleports\some pushzones\timers and enable lowgravity at all traps (and partyhall) for 10s. Cooldown 105s +5 announcement)
- Fast teleports to 20\40\60\80\100 levels (for admins with noclip\spectators) near the starthall (room with 5 doors)

Trapz:
Many variations of Jumps\Strafes\Invis\Flash\MovingPlatforms\BadCamera\LongJumps\Fans\Timers\ButtonPlatforms\Slide\Climb\WaterClimb\Gravity\HardJumps\Spikes\SpinningPlatforms\Elevators\Fall\Physics\Bhop\Walls\Ladders\Teleports\Buttons\Surf\Combined\Other

requires noblock plugin

MG_OFFICE_COURCEE

Hey hello.

I started this map a while back, because then at the time i was playing the map "mg_jakes_office_cource" Wich what i think looks kinda bad. So i thought i can make this map much better than this version.

The Traps...

Trap  1: Choose Left or Right
Trap  2: Run Bitch Run!
Trap  3: Sliding Killing Doors
Trap  4: Jump On Vending machines
Trap  5: Moving Lazer
Trap  6: Choose the right ladder (only 1 kills)
Trap  7: Invisible floor
Trap  8: Choose right Platforms
Trap  9: Spinning Vent
Trap 10: Easy Lazers
Trap 11: Jump Around Walls
Trap 12: Climb + Longjump

64 Spawns

Then at the End there is a little disco where the Winner can choose some special (powers) for the next rounds. + they get 200 points if they finish.

I hope people will enjoy this map, hope there are no bugs in it anymore...

And please if there is anything wrong with the map just pm me and if its something big il make another version of this map.

ENJOY!!!
